creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Multiple scene print; L PANEL: black silhouette of a 2-masted boat against a peach, ochre, red and purple sky; a bright yellow sun, UR, and black orbits throughout; red, yellow and brown water: R PANEL: a brown seabed against a black, scribbled in background; BOTTOM PANEL: a blue and black seabed with foreign objects (presumably vestiges of a boat) lodged in the sand
marks:
Signed, dated, numbered, chopmark LC: [T.L. Solien \'85]
LL: [CTP 3/4]
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Mpls.; Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid, Minnepolis; their gift to MIA, 1986.
title: The Husband Lost at Sea
